Body.Content:
We've expanded Power Platform inventory (Public Preview) to include four new resource types, giving admins a single view of resources across Power Platform and Microsoft 365 Copilot.

Starting December 1, 2025, and completing worldwide by December 20, 2025, inventory will include:
  • Agents from Agent Builder (Copilot Studio lite) in Microsoft 365 Copilot
  • Workflows from the Workflows agent in Microsoft 365 Copilot
  • Agent flows from Copilot Studio
  • Cloud flows from Power Automate
How does this affect me?
All new resources will automatically appear in the Inventory page under Manage in the Power Platform admin center. You'll also see product-specific views:
  • Manage > Inventory: All resources in one place
  • Manage > Copilot Studio: Agents (Agent Builder + Copilot Studio), agent flows, and workflows
  • Manage > Power Apps > App Inventory tab: Canvas, model-driven, code, vibe, and App Builder apps
  • Manage > Power Automate > Flow Inventory tab: Cloud flows
For more information, please visit Power Platform inventory (preview).

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

Title: Power Platform inventory to include agents, apps, and workflows from Microsoft 365 Copilot, agent flows, and cloud flows
